quote: A wise master teaches.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: To become a master at any skill, it takes the total effort of your: heart, mind, and soul working together in tandem.
author: Maurice Young

quote: One can be the master of what one does, but never of what one feels.
author: Gustave Flaubert

quote: I AM THE MASTER OF MY FATE AND THE CAPTAIN OF MY DESTINY.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: A disciple came to the celebrated Master of the Good Name with a question. “Rabbi, how are we to distinguish between a true master and a fake?” And the master of the good name said, “When you meet a person who poses as a master, ask him a question: whether he knows how to purify your thoughts. If he says that he knows, then he is a fake.
author: Elie Wiesel

quote: I was taught that I had to 'master' subjects. But who can 'master' beauty, or peace, or joy?
author: Kathleen Norris,  The Psalms

quote: If you can think independently, you are the master of this universe.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Love is a better master than duty.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Do not live in the shadow of the masters for ever. Learn to live in the light of your soul. Life deserves full expression.
author: Amit Ray

quote: You've maddened me for you...have changed everything. So, I'm going to f*ck you long and hard, beauty, because if I'm to be enslaved by you-I want to be your master as well.
author: Kresley Cole,  Pleasure of a Dark Prince

quote: I need no master to punish me in order to behave as I ought. If I did, I would be no more than a child who obeys his father's rules only because he fears the whip, and not because he actually means good.
author: Christopher Paolini,  Inheritance

quote: In that little pocket-size world of his, he was the absolute master.
author: Eileen Chang

quote: The great mentor is master builder of great students.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Oh, aye, Sassenach. I am your master . . . and you're mine. Seems I canna possess your soul without losing my own.
author: Diana Gabaldon,  Outlander

quote: You cannot control what happens to you, but you can control your attitude toward what happens to you, and in that, you will be mastering change rather than allowing it to master you.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: You are the master of your destiny. You can influence, direct and control your own environment. You can make your life what you want it to be.
author: Napoleon Hill,  Think and Grow Rich

quote: Read Euler, read Euler, he is the master of us all.
author: Pierre-Simon Laplace

quote: Dominate in your domain; You can do it.
author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu,  The Prince and the Pauper

quote: Smartass Disciple: Master, you should teach people not to do war to each other.Master of Stupidity: I should teach people how to win their minds of their wars.
author: Toba Beta,  Master of Stupidity

quote: The mind is a wonderful servant, but a terrible master.
author: Robin S. Sharma

quote: The more aware of your intentions and your experiences you become, the more you will be able to connect the two, and the more you will be able to create the experiences of your life consciously. This is the development of mastery. It is the creation of authentic power.
author: Gary Zukav

quote: I think it was the institution...I was trying to master it.
author: E. Lockhart,  The Disreputable History of Frankie Landau-Banks

quote: The master said You must write what you see.But what I see does not move me.The master answered Change what you see.
author: Louise Glück,  Vita Nova

quote: Man masters nature not by force, but by understanding
author: Jacob Bronowski

quote: The master of the garden is the one who waters it, trims the branches, plants the seeds, and pulls the weeds. If you merely stroll through the garden, you are but an acolyte.
author: Vera Nazarian,  The Perpetual Calendar of Inspiration

quote: Smartass Disciple: Master, what is the secret recipe of your happiness?Master of Stupidity: If I tell you, there is nobody left to be made fun of.
author: Toba Beta

quote: Politicians [10w] All politicians serve two masters ~their ambition and their cocks.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: No man is free who is not master of himself.
author: Epictetus

quote: Whereas a novice makes moves until he gets checkmated (proof), a Grand Master realizes 20 moves in advance that it’s futile to continue playing (conceptualizing).
author: Bill Gaede

quote: Lord, grant that I may always desire more than I can accomplish.
author: Michelangelo

quote: No more is your master a god, Nobility, but he wants offerings from all. When Black God claims us, who will be punished for giving worship and power to a false god? The prince? Or Banjiku?
author: Tamora Pierce,  Emperor Mage

quote: Music is my higher power
author: Oliver James

quote: Friends who love us know that motherhood is about transitioning--and adjusting, constantly, to those changes. We must become masters of change because that is what life demands of us.
author: Meg Meeker,  The 10 Habits of Happy Mothers: Reclaiming Our Passion, Purpose, and Sanity

quote: My cat is ignorant of the law. But then so am I. That means I am not his master, because we are both slaves.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: Smartass Disciple: Master, do you really believe in the second chance?Master of Stupidity: That supports the basis of lost-then-found concept.
author: Toba Beta,  Master of Stupidity

quote: Accurs'd McDonalds, I Bite my Thumb at Thee! {Couplet} Let vex'd heavens rant and rage,This here McNigga slave ain't workin' for no McMinimum wage.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: YOU are your own guru. YOU are your own soul mate. YOU are powerful. Take the reigns and drive your carriage home to love.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: Edit your life frequently and ruthlessly. It's your masterpiece after all.
author: Nathan W. Morris

quote: No one can serve two masters. Either he will hate the one and love the other, or he will be devoted to the one and despise the other. You cannot serve both God and Money.
author: Anonymous,  Holy Bible: King James Version

quote: One reason so few of us achieve what we truly want is that we never direct our focus; we never concentrate our power. Most people dabble their way through life, never deciding to master anything in particular.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: I am not a leader but a pathfinder and a motivator.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: I am a slave to your love. Well, more like indentured servant.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: My mind's my kingdom.
author: Francis Quarles

quote: Behind a life of influence you will find a masterful storyteller.
author: Mollie Marti

quote: What the caterpillar calls the end of the world, the master calls a butterfly.
author: Richard Bach,  Illusions: The Adventures of a Reluctant Messiah

quote: striid andWthdraw into yourself. Our master-reason asks no more than to act justly, and thereby to achieve calm.
author: Marcus Aurelius,  Meditations

quote: Babe!
author: Janet Evanovich

quote: I am a master of logic and a powerfully convincing debater. In fact, against my better judgment, I can talk myself out of doing anything.
author: Jarod Kintz,  $3.33

quote: LearningTo believe you are magnificent. And gradually to discover that you are not magnificent. Enough labor for one human life.
author: Czesław Miłosz

quote: One heart cannot serve two masters.
author: Robin LaFevers,  Grave Mercy
